blog.name: vintagegeekculture
blog.title: Vintage Geek Culture
blog.description: Dedicated to all things "geek retro:" the science fiction/fantasy/horror fandom of the past (1910s-1970s), including pin up art, novel covers, pulp magazines, and comics.

summary: Simonson/Palmer cover for the 1983 reprint special edition. I have this one as my computer desktop wallpaper.  Just looking at...
caption:
Simonson/Palmer cover for the 1983 reprint special edition. I have this one as my computer desktop wallpaper. 

Just looking at it gives me tremendous excitement and nostalgia for classic Marvel and Avengers. 

Bonus: the non-wraparound cover of the next issue. 

It had amazing moments, like the Vision and Scarlet Witch falling in love….

Ant-Man entering the Vision’s body at tiny size to reactivate the Vision….

And Captain Marvel seeing through Skrull subterfuge.

summary: Nuevos vistazos a Avengers 4, Capitana Marvel y Nick Fury
title: Nuevos vistazos a Avengers 4, Capitana Marvel y Nick Fury
body:
Nuevos vistazos a Avengers 4, Capitana Marvel y Nick Fury

A primeros de mes publicamos tres posibles artes conceptuales de Avengers Untitled, título que tiene actualmente la cuarta película de los Vengadores, que revelarían algunos interesantes detalles sobre la nueva producción de Marvel Studios.

Ahora traemos una continuación de la misma publicación. En este caso no aporta información adicional, pero pensamos que es interesante. A continuación, alguna…

View On WordPress

summary: Congratulations! You have officially been invited to the inauguration of the newest building to grace the Manhattan skyline!...
caption:
Congratulations! You have officially been invited to the inauguration of the newest building to grace the Manhattan skyline! Being one of the most ambitious projects for architects, the apartment complex brings together shared feelings of joy, sorrow and friendship within the amenities of a bar and rooftop, where you’ll do more than sightseeing. You’ll feel a sense of togetherness through music blasting, people chatting and lights illuminating. And the best part, it’s all for the most ordinary of citizens.

When it’s 19:39, you know it’s a sign. Come join us on the rooftop just where you belong!

19:39 is an AU Marvel roleplay on Discord where every character is a resident of the Marvel apartment complex located in the heart of Manhattan.

MAIN | PREMISE | RULES | APPLY | MASTERLIST (Mobile ver) | QUESTIONS

summary: עדכונים לגבי שומרי הגלקסיה 3 והסרט הבא של ספיידרמן
title: עדכונים לגבי שומרי הגלקסיה 3 והסרט הבא של ספיידרמן
body:
עדכונים לגבי שומרי הגלקסיה 3 והסרט הבא של ספיידרמן

הטיוטה הראשונה ל”שומרי הגלקסיה 3″ כבר מוכנה, וגם: חדשות טובות בנוגע לספיידרמן

מעריצי מארוול, זהו בהחלט השבוע שלכם: במהלך הימים האחרונים קיבלו המעריצים מספר עדכונים חשובים אודות סרטים קרובים ביקום הקולנועי של מארוול, “שומרי הגלקסיה 3”, סרט ההמשך של “ספיידרמן: השיבה הביתה” ו”קפטן מארוול”.

נתחיל, איך לא, עם “שומרי הגלקסיה 3”. ג’יימס גאן, היוצר של שני הסרטים הקודמים בסדרה, ממשיך את העשייה גם בחלק…

View On WordPress

summary: Death is final. Everyone knows that. It’s drilled into the heads of children, of police officers, of doctors. The finality of...
caption:
Death is final. Everyone knows that. It’s drilled into the heads of children, of police officers, of doctors. The finality of life haunts even the strongest of us.

But what if they were all wrong? What if the people you love most were simply lost, trapped somewhere waiting to be freed from Thanos’s unwitting clutches? What would you do to free the people you love?

Main✵Plot✵Characters✵Rules✵Questions

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: These images have popped up online featuring what looks to be promo art for the Captain Marvel movie. Check out Carol Danvers...
body:
These images have popped up online featuring what looks to be promo art for the Captain Marvel movie. Check out Carol Danvers (Brie Larson) and a young Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson) in the gallery below.


Synopsis: Captain Marvel gets caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

Captain Marvel opens in theaters 03/08/19

New Promo Art For Captain Marvel These images have popped up online featuring what looks to be promo art for the Captain Marvel…

summary: Realisation: Peter Quill can remain the ‘only Terran in space’ even if it turns out Carol has been out there since the nineties...
body: Realisation: Peter Quill can remain the ‘only Terran in space’ even if it turns out Carol has been out there since the nineties or whatever - she’s technically half-Kree.
